thread.title: You will not believe what this Man United star did for their clash against Leicester
thread.title_full: You will not believe what this Man United star did for their clash against Leicester

title: You will not believe what this Man United star did for their clash against Leicester
text:
Paul Pogba got his Twitter emoji emblazoned on his boots this weekend 
Pogba became the first football to launch his own emoji last month. 
And it seems the Manchester United ace has decided to go one step further and get his face emblazoned on his boots. Whatever will the Frenchman do next? 
Click through the gallery above to see all the best snaps of Pogba's emoji-emblazoned boots! Related articles
